headline: HCA Healthcare Aligns Nursing Leadership With $10b Buyback And Dividend Plan
summary: HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) promoted Erica Rossitto to Chief Nurse Executive, expanding her role over the nursing workforce and patient care strategy across the system. The company announced a new $10b share repurchase authorization and raised its quarterly dividend, indicating how it currently prioritizes capital returns to shareholders. These moves were released together as part of a broader update on leadership and capital allocation decisions. HCA Healthcare operates a large network of...
